      int AI.valuePiece(AbstractPiece piece, java.lang.String whoseTurn)
      Piece values (positive for white, negative for black) pawn = 1 knight = 3 bishop = 3 rook = 5 queen = 9 king = 0 (don't factor king into this, theres no point if you have no king)
